115World::World()

125 m_MaxPlayerCount = 0;

127 m_NextWeeklyQuestReset = 0s;

144World::~World()
145{
147 while (!m_sessions.empty())
148 {
149 // not remove from queue, prevent loading new sessions
150 delete m_sessions.begin()->second;
151 m_sessions.erase(m_sessions.begin());
152 }
153
154 while (!m_offlineSessions.empty())
155 {
156 delete m_offlineSessions.begin()->second;
157 m_offlineSessions.erase(m_offlineSessions.begin());
158 }
159
160 CliCommandHolder* command = nullptr;
161 while (cliCmdQueue.next(command))
162 delete command;
163
164 VMAP::VMapFactory::clear();
165 MMAP::MMapFactory::clear();
166
167 //TODO free addSessQueue
168}

170std::unique_ptr<IWorld>& getWorldInstance()
171{
172 static std::unique_ptr<IWorld> instance = std::make_unique<World>();
173 return instance;
174}
175
177Player* World::FindPlayerInZone(uint32 zone)
178{
180 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
181 for (itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
182 {
183 if (!itr->second)
184 continue;
185
186 Player* player = itr->second->GetPlayer();
187 if (!player)
188 continue;
189
190 if (player->IsInWorld() && player->GetZoneId() == zone)
191 return player;
192 }
193 return nullptr;
194}
195
196bool World::IsClosed() const
197{
198 return m_isClosed;
199}
200
201void World::SetClosed(bool val)
202{
203 m_isClosed = val;
204
205 // Invert the value, for simplicity for scripters.
206 sScriptMgr->OnOpenStateChange(!val);
207}
208
210WorldSession* World::FindSession(uint32 id) const
211{
212 SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.find(id);
213
214 if (itr != m_sessions.end())
215 return itr->second; // also can return nullptr for kicked session
216 else
217 return nullptr;
218}
219
220WorldSession* World::FindOfflineSession(uint32 id) const
221{
222 SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_offlineSessions.find(id);
223 if (itr != m_offlineSessions.end())
224 return itr->second;
225 else
226 return nullptr;
227}
228
229WorldSession* World::FindOfflineSessionForCharacterGUID(ObjectGuid::LowType guidLow) const
230{
231 if (m_offlineSessions.empty())
232 return nullptr;
233
234 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_offlineSessions.begin(); itr != m_offlineSessions.end(); ++itr)
235 if (itr->second->GetGuidLow() == guidLow)
236 return itr->second;
237
238 return nullptr;
239}
240
242bool World::KickSession(uint32 id)
243{
245 SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.find(id);
246
247 if (itr != m_sessions.end() && itr->second)
248 {
249 if (itr->second->PlayerLoading())
250 return false;
251
252 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickSession", false);
253 }
254
255 return true;
256}
257
258void World::AddSession(WorldSession* s)
259{
260 addSessQueue.add(s);
261}
262
263void World::AddSession_(WorldSession* s)
264{
265 ASSERT (s);
266
267 // kick existing session with same account (if any)
268 // if character on old session is being loaded, then return
269 if (!KickSession(s->GetAccountId()))
270 {
271 s->KickPlayer("kick existing session with same account");
272 delete s; // session not added yet in session list, so not listed in queue
273 return;
274 }
275
276 SessionMap::const_iterator old = m_sessions.find(s->GetAccountId());
277 if (old != m_sessions.end())
278 {
279 WorldSession* oldSession = old->second;
280
281 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(oldSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
282 m_disconnects[s->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
283
284 // pussywizard:
285 if (oldSession->HandleSocketClosed())
286 {
287 // there should be no offline session if current one is logged onto a character
288 SessionMap::iterator iter;
289 if ((iter = m_offlineSessions.find(oldSession->GetAccountId())) != m_offlineSessions.end())
290 {
291 WorldSession* tmp = iter->second;
292 m_offlineSessions.erase(iter);
293 tmp->SetShouldSetOfflineInDB(false);
294 delete tmp;
295 }
296 oldSession->SetOfflineTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
297 m_offlineSessions[oldSession->GetAccountId()] = oldSession;
298 }
299 else
300 {
301 oldSession->SetShouldSetOfflineInDB(false); // pussywizard: don't set offline in db because new session for that acc is already created
302 delete oldSession;
303 }
304 }
305
306 m_sessions[s->GetAccountId()] = s;
307
308 uint32 Sessions = GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount();
309 uint32 pLimit = GetPlayerAmountLimit();
310
311 // don't count this session when checking player limit
312 --Sessions;
313
314 if (pLimit > 0 && Sessions >= pLimit && AccountMgr::IsPlayerAccount(s->GetSecurity()) && !s->CanSkipQueue() && !HasRecentlyDisconnected(s))
315 {
316 AddQueuedPlayer (s);
317 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
318 return;
319 }
320
321 s->SendAuthResponse(AUTH_OK, true);
322
323 FinalizePlayerWorldSession(s);
324
325 UpdateMaxSessionCounters();
326}
327
328bool World::HasRecentlyDisconnected(WorldSession* session)
329{
330 if (!session)
331 return false;
332
333 if (uint32 tolerance = getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
334 {
335 for (DisconnectMap::iterator i = m_disconnects.begin(); i != m_disconnects.end();)
336 {
337 if ((GameTime::GetGameTime().count() - i->second) < tolerance)
338 {
339 if (i->first == session->GetAccountId())
340 return true;
341 ++i;
342 }
343 else
344 m_disconnects.erase(i++);
345 }
346 }
347 return false;
348}
349
350int32 World::GetQueuePos(WorldSession* sess)
351{
352 uint32 position = 1;
353
354 for (Queue::const_iterator iter = m_QueuedPlayer.begin(); iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
355 if ((*iter) == sess)
356 return position;
357
358 return 0;
359}
360
361void World::AddQueuedPlayer(WorldSession* sess)
362{
363 sess->SetInQueue(true);
364 m_QueuedPlayer.push_back(sess);
365
366 // The 1st SMSG_AUTH_RESPONSE needs to contain other info too.
367 sess->SendAuthResponse(AUTH_WAIT_QUEUE, false, GetQueuePos(sess));
368}
369
370bool World::RemoveQueuedPlayer(WorldSession* sess)
371{
372 uint32 sessions = GetActiveSessionCount();
373
374 uint32 position = 1;
375 Queue::iterator iter = m_QueuedPlayer.begin();
376
377 // search to remove and count skipped positions
378 bool found = false;
379
380 for (; iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
381 {
382 if (*iter == sess)
383 {
384 sess->SetInQueue(false);
385 sess->ResetTimeOutTime(false);
386 iter = m_QueuedPlayer.erase(iter);
387 found = true;
388 break;
389 }
390 }
391
392 // if session not queued then it was an active session
393 if (!found)
394 {
395 ASSERT(sessions > 0);
396 --sessions;
397 }
398
399 // accept first in queue
400 if ((!GetPlayerAmountLimit() || sessions < GetPlayerAmountLimit()) && !m_QueuedPlayer.empty())
401 {
402 WorldSession* pop_sess = m_QueuedPlayer.front();
403 pop_sess->SetInQueue(false);
404 pop_sess->ResetTimeOutTime(false);
405 pop_sess->SendAuthWaitQueue(0);
406 pop_sess->SendAccountDataTimes(GLOBAL_CACHE_MASK);
407
408 FinalizePlayerWorldSession(pop_sess);
409
410 m_QueuedPlayer.pop_front();
411
412 // update iter to point first queued socket or end() if queue is empty now
413 iter = m_QueuedPlayer.begin();
414 position = 1;
415 }
416
417 // update queue position from iter to end()
418 for (; iter != m_QueuedPlayer.end(); ++iter, ++position)
419 (*iter)->SendAuthWaitQueue(position);
420
421 return found;
422}

425void World::LoadConfigSettings(bool reload)
426{
427 if (reload)
428 {
429 if (!sConfigMgr->Reload())
430 {
431 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "World settings reload fail: can't read settings.");
432 return;
433 }
434
435 sLog->LoadFromConfig();
436 sMetric->LoadFromConfigs();
437 }
438
439 // Set realm id and enable db logging
440 sLog->SetRealmId(realm.Id.Realm);
441
442 sScriptMgr->OnBeforeConfigLoad(reload);
443
444 // load update time related configs
445 sWorldUpdateTime.LoadFromConfig();
446
448 if (!reload)
449 {
450 SetPlayerAmountLimit(sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("PlayerLimit", 1000));
451 }
452
453 Motd::SetMotd(sConfigMgr->GetOption<std::string>("Motd", "Welcome to an AzerothCore server"));
454
456 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_TICKETS] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowTickets", true);
457 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_DELETE_CHARACTER_TICKET_TRACE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("DeletedCharacterTicketTrace", false);
458
460 SetNewCharString(sConfigMgr->GetOption<std::string>("PlayerStart.String", ""));
461
463 m_int_configs[CONFIG_ENABLE_SINFO_LOGIN] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("Server.LoginInfo", 0);
464
466 rate_values[RATE_HEALTH] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Rate.Health", 1);
467 if (rate_values[RATE_HEALTH] < 0)
468 {
469 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.Health ({}) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_HEALTH]);
470 rate_values[RATE_HEALTH] = 1;
471 }
472 rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<float>("Rate.Mana", 1);
473 if (rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA] < 0)
474 {
475 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.Mana ({}) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA]);
476 rate_values[RATE_POWER_MANA] = 1;

480 if (rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_LOSS] < 0)
481 {
482 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Rate.Rage.Loss ({}) must be > 0. Using 1 instead.", rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_LOSS]);
483 rate_values[RATE_POWER_RAGE_LOSS] = 1;

1444 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_DUNGEON_ACCESS_REQUIREMENTS_LFG_DBC_LEVEL_OVERRIDE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("DungeonAccessRequirements.LFGLevelDBCOverride", false);
1445 m_int_configs[CONFIG_DUNGEON_ACCESS_REQUIREMENTS_OPTIONAL_STRING_ID] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DungeonAccessRequirements.OptionalStringID", 0);

1457

1459 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_ALLOW_LOGGING_IP_ADDRESSES_IN_DATABASE] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("AllowLoggingIPAddressesInDatabase", true, true);
1460
1461 // LFG group mechanics.
1462 m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LFG.MaxKickCount", 2);
1463 if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] > 3)
1464 {
1465 m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_MAX_KICK_COUNT] = 3;
1466 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LFG.MaxKickCount can't be higher than 3.");
1467 }
1468
1469 m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("LFG.KickPreventionTimer", 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS) * IN_MILLISECONDS;
1470 if (m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] > 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS)
1471 {
1472 m_int_configs[CONFIG_LFG_KICK_PREVENTION_TIMER] = 15 * MINUTE * IN_MILLISECONDS;
1473 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "LFG.KickPreventionTimer can't be higher than 15 minutes.");
1474 }
1475
1476 // Realm Availability
1477 m_bool_configs[CONFIG_REALM_LOGIN_ENABLED] = sConfigMgr->GetOption<bool>("World.RealmAvailability", true);
1478
1479 // call ScriptMgr if we're reloading the configuration
1480 sScriptMgr->OnAfterConfigLoad(reload);
1481}

1484void World::SetInitialWorldSettings()
1485{
1487 uint32 startupBegin = getMSTime();

1490 srand((unsigned int)GameTime::GetGameTime().count());

1493 dtAllocSetCustom(dtCustomAlloc, dtCustomFree);

1508
1509 if (!sConfigMgr->isDryRun())
1510 {
1512 if (!MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -6240.32f, 331.033f)
1513 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, -8949.95f, -132.493f)
1514 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -618.518f, -4251.67f)
1515 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(0, 1676.35f, 1677.45f)
1516 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, 10311.3f, 832.463f)
1517 || !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(1, -2917.58f, -257.98f)
1518 || (m_int_configs[CONFIG_EXPANSION] && (
1519 !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(530, 10349.6f, -6357.29f) ||
1520 !MapMgr::ExistMapAndVMap(530, -3961.64f, -13931.2f))))

1523 }

2177
2178void World::DetectDBCLang()
2179{
2180 uint8 m_lang_confid = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("DBC.Locale", 255);
2181
2182 if (m_lang_confid != 255 && m_lang_confid >= TOTAL_LOCALES)
2183 {
2184 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Incorrect DBC.Locale! Must be >= 0 and < {} (set to 0)", TOTAL_LOCALES);
2185 m_lang_confid = LOCALE_enUS;
2186 }
2187
2188 ChrRacesEntry const* race = sChrRacesStore.LookupEntry(1);
2189 std::string availableLocalsStr;
2190
2191 uint8 default_locale = TOTAL_LOCALES;
2192 for (uint8 i = default_locale - 1; i < TOTAL_LOCALES; --i) // -1 will be 255 due to uint8
2193 {
2194 if (race->name[i][0] != '\0') // check by race names
2195 {
2196 default_locale = i;
2197 m_availableDbcLocaleMask |= (1 << i);
2198 availableLocalsStr += localeNames[i];
2199 availableLocalsStr += " ";
2200 }
2201 }
2202
2203 if (default_locale != m_lang_confid && m_lang_confid < TOTAL_LOCALES &&
2204 (m_availableDbcLocaleMask & (1 << m_lang_confid)))
2205 {
2206 default_locale = m_lang_confid;
2207 }
2208
2209 if (default_locale >= TOTAL_LOCALES)
2210 {
2211 LOG_ERROR("server.loading", "Unable to determine your DBC Locale! (corrupt DBC?)");
2212 exit(1);
2213 }
2214
2215 m_defaultDbcLocale = LocaleConstant(default_locale);
2216
2217 LOG_INFO("server.loading", "Using {} DBC Locale As Default. All Available DBC locales: {}", localeNames[GetDefaultDbcLocale()], availableLocalsStr.empty() ? "<none>" : availableLocalsStr);
2218 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2219}
2220
2221void World::LoadAutobroadcasts()
2222{
2223 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
2224
2225 m_Autobroadcasts.clear();
2226 m_AutobroadcastsWeights.clear();
2227
2228 uint32 realmId = sConfigMgr->GetOption<int32>("RealmID", 0);
2229 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_SEL_AUTOBROADCAST);
2230 stmt->SetData(0, realmId);
2231 PreparedQueryResult result = LoginDatabase.Query(stmt);
2232
2233 if (!result)
2234 {
2235 LOG_WARN("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 autobroadcasts definitions. DB table `autobroadcast` is empty for this realm!");
2236 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2237 return;
2238 }
2239
2240 uint32 count = 0;
2241
2242 do
2243 {
2244 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
2245 uint8 id = fields[0].Get<uint8>();
2246
2247 m_Autobroadcasts[id] = fields[2].Get<std::string>();
2248 m_AutobroadcastsWeights[id] = fields[1].Get<uint8>();
2249
2250 ++count;
2251 } while (result->NextRow());
2252
2253 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded {} Autobroadcast Definitions in {} ms", count, GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
2254 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
2255}
2256
2258void World::Update(uint32 diff)
2259{
2260 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time_total");
2261
2263 _UpdateGameTime();
2264 Seconds currentGameTime = GameTime::GetGameTime();
2265
2266 sWorldUpdateTime.UpdateWithDiff(diff);
2267
2268 // Record update if recording set in log and diff is greater then minimum set in log
2269 sWorldUpdateTime.RecordUpdateTime(GameTime::GetGameTimeMS(), diff, GetActiveSessionCount());
2270
2271 DynamicVisibilityMgr::Update(GetActiveSessionCount());
2272
2274 for (int i = 0; i < WUPDATE_COUNT; ++i)
2275 {
2276 if (m_timers[i].GetCurrent() >= 0)
2277 m_timers[i].Update(diff);
2278 else
2279 m_timers[i].SetCurrent(0);
2280 }
2281
2282 // pussywizard: our speed up and functionality
2283 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].Passed())
2284 {
2285 m_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].Reset();
2286
2287 // moved here from HandleCharEnumOpcode
2288 CharacterDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_EXPIRED_BANS);
2289 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2290 }
2291
2293 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].Passed())
2294 {
2295 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update who list"));
2296 m_timers[WUPDATE_WHO_LIST].Reset();
2297 sWhoListCacheMgr->Update();
2298 }
2299
2300 {
2301 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Check quest reset times"));
2302
2304 if (currentGameTime > m_NextDailyQuestReset)
2305 {
2306 ResetDailyQuests();
2307 }
2308
2310 if (currentGameTime > m_NextWeeklyQuestReset)
2311 {
2312 ResetWeeklyQuests();
2313 }
2314
2316 if (currentGameTime > m_NextMonthlyQuestReset)
2317 {
2318 ResetMonthlyQuests();
2319 }
2320 }
2321
2322 if (currentGameTime > m_NextRandomBGReset)
2323 {
2324 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset random BG"));
2325 ResetRandomBG();
2326 }
2327
2328 if (currentGameTime > m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime)
2329 {
2330 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Delete old calendar events"));
2331 CalendarDeleteOldEvents();
2332 }
2333
2334 if (currentGameTime > m_NextGuildReset)
2335 {
2336 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Reset guild cap"));
2337 ResetGuildCap();
2338 }
2339
2340 // pussywizard:
2341 // acquire mutex now, this is kind of waiting for listing thread to finish it's work (since it can't process next packet)
2342 // so we don't have to do it in every packet that modifies auctions
2343 AsyncAuctionListingMgr::SetAuctionListingAllowed(false);
2344 {
2345 std::lock_guard<std::mutex> guard(AsyncAuctionListingMgr::GetLock());
2346
2347 // pussywizard: handle auctions when the timer has passed
2348 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Passed())
2349 {
2350 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update expired auctions"));
2351
2352 m_timers[WUPDATE_AUCTIONS].Reset();
2353
2354 // pussywizard: handle expired auctions, auctions expired when realm was offline are also handled here (not during loading when many required things aren't loaded yet)
2355 sAuctionMgr->Update();
2356 }
2357
2358 AsyncAuctionListingMgr::Update(diff);
2359
2360 if (currentGameTime > mail_expire_check_timer)
2361 {
2362 sObjectMgr->ReturnOrDeleteOldMails(true);
2363 mail_expire_check_timer = currentGameTime + 6h;
2364 }
2365
2366 {
2368 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update sessions"));
2369 UpdateSessions(diff);
2370 }
2371 }
2372
2373 // end of section with mutex
2374 AsyncAuctionListingMgr::SetAuctionListingAllowed(true);
2375
2377 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Passed())
2378 {
2379 m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].Reset();
2380 WeatherMgr::Update(uint32(m_timers[WUPDATE_WEATHERS].GetInterval()));
2381 }
2382
2384 if (sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME) > 0) // if not enabled, ignore the timer
2385 {
2386 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Passed())
2387 {
2388 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Clean logs table"));
2389
2390 m_timers[WUPDATE_CLEANDB].Reset();
2391
2392 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_DEL_OLD_LOGS);
2393 stmt->SetData(0, sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_LOGDB_CLEARTIME));
2394 stmt->SetData(1, uint32(currentGameTime.count()));
2395 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2396 }
2397 }
2398
2399 {
2400 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update LFG 0"));
2401 sLFGMgr->Update(diff, 0); // pussywizard: remove obsolete stuff before finding compatibility during map update
2402 }
2403
2404 {
2406 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update maps"));
2407 sMapMgr->Update(diff);
2408 }
2409
2410 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST))
2411 {
2412 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Passed())
2413 {
2414 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Send autobroadcast"));
2415 m_timers[WUPDATE_AUTOBROADCAST].Reset();
2416 SendAutoBroadcast();
2417 }
2418 }
2419
2420 {
2421 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update battlegrounds"));
2422 sBattlegroundMgr->Update(diff);
2423 }
2424
2425 {
2426 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update outdoor pvp"));
2427 sOutdoorPvPMgr->Update(diff);
2428 }
2429
2430 {
2431 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update battlefields"));
2432 sBattlefieldMgr->Update(diff);
2433 }
2434
2435 {
2436 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update LFG 2"));
2437 sLFGMgr->Update(diff, 2); // pussywizard: handle created proposals
2438 }
2439
2440 {
2441 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Process query callbacks"));
2442 // execute callbacks from sql queries that were queued recently
2443 ProcessQueryCallbacks();
2444 }
2445
2447 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Passed())
2448 {
2449 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update uptime"));
2450
2451 m_timers[WUPDATE_UPTIME].Reset();
2452
2453 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_UPD_UPTIME_PLAYERS);
2454 stmt->SetData(0, uint32(GameTime::GetUptime().count()));
2455 stmt->SetData(1, uint16(GetMaxPlayerCount()));
2456 stmt->SetData(2, realm.Id.Realm);
2457 stmt->SetData(3, uint32(GameTime::GetStartTime().count()));
2458 LoginDatabase.Execute(stmt);
2459 }
2460
2462 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Passed())
2463 {
2464 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Remove old corpses"));
2465 m_timers[WUPDATE_CORPSES].Reset();
2466
2467 sMapMgr->DoForAllMaps([](Map* map)
2468 {
2469 map->RemoveOldCorpses();
2470 });
2471 }
2472
2474 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Passed())
2475 {
2476 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update game events"));
2477 m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset(); // to give time for Update() to be processed
2478 uint32 nextGameEvent = sGameEventMgr->Update();
2479 m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].SetInterval(nextGameEvent);
2480 m_timers[WUPDATE_EVENTS].Reset();
2481 }
2482
2484 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Passed())
2485 {
2486 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Ping MySQL"));
2487 m_timers[WUPDATE_PINGDB].Reset();
2488 LOG_DEBUG("sql.driver", "Ping MySQL to keep connection alive");
2489 CharacterDatabase.KeepAlive();
2490 LoginDatabase.KeepAlive();
2491 WorldDatabase.KeepAlive();
2492 }
2493
2494 {
2495 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update instance reset times"));
2496 // update the instance reset times
2497 sInstanceSaveMgr->Update();
2498 }
2499
2500 {
2501 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Process cli commands"));
2502 // And last, but not least handle the issued cli commands
2503 ProcessCliCommands();
2504 }
2505
2506 {
2507 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update world scripts"));
2508 sScriptMgr->OnWorldUpdate(diff);
2509 }
2510
2511 {
2512 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update playersSaveScheduler"));
2513 playersSaveScheduler.Update(diff);
2514 }
2515
2516 {
2517 METRIC_TIMER("world_update_time", METRIC_TAG("type", "Update metrics"));
2518 // Stats logger update
2519 sMetric->Update();
2520 METRIC_VALUE("update_time_diff", diff);
2521 }
2522}

2531
2533void World::SendGlobalMessage(WorldPacket const* packet, WorldSession* self, TeamId teamId)
2534{
2535 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
2536 for (itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2537 {
2538 if (itr->second &&
2539 itr->second->GetPlayer() &&
2540 itr->second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld() &&
2541 itr->second != self &&
2542 (teamId == TEAM_NEUTRAL || itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetTeamId() == teamId))
2543 {
2544 itr->second->SendPacket(packet);
2545 }
2546 }
2547}

2550void World::SendGlobalGMMessage(WorldPacket const* packet, WorldSession* self, TeamId teamId)
2551{
2552 SessionMap::iterator itr;

2566
2567namespace Acore
2568{
2569 class WorldWorldTextBuilder
2570 {
2571 public:
2572 typedef std::vector<WorldPacket*> WorldPacketList;
2573 explicit WorldWorldTextBuilder(uint32 textId, va_list* args = nullptr) : i_textId(textId), i_args(args) {}
2574 void operator()(WorldPacketList& data_list, LocaleConstant loc_idx)
2575 {
2576 char const* text = sObjectMgr->GetAcoreString(i_textId, loc_idx);
2577
2578 if (i_args)
2579 {
2580 // we need copy va_list before use or original va_list will corrupted
2581 va_list ap;
2582 va_copy(ap, *i_args);
2583
2584 char str[2048];
2585 vsnprintf(str, 2048, text, ap);
2586 va_end(ap);
2587
2588 do_helper(data_list, &str[0]);
2589 }
2590 else
2591 do_helper(data_list, (char*)text);
2592 }
2593 private:
2594 char* lineFromMessage(char*& pos) { char* start = strtok(pos, "\n"); pos = nullptr; return start; }
2595 void do_helper(WorldPacketList& data_list, char* text)
2596 {
2597 char* pos = text;
2598 while (char* line = lineFromMessage(pos))
2599 {
2600 WorldPacket* data = new WorldPacket();
2601 ChatHandler::BuildChatPacket(*data, CHAT_MSG_SYSTEM, LANG_UNIVERSAL, nullptr, nullptr, line);
2602 data_list.push_back(data);
2603 }
2604 }
2605
2606 uint32 i_textId;
2607 va_list* i_args;
2608 };
2609} // namespace Acore
2610
2612void World::SendWorldText(uint32 string_id, ...)
2613{
2614 va_list ap;
2615 va_start(ap, string_id);
2616
2617 Acore::WorldWorldTextBuilder wt_builder(string_id, &ap);
2618 Acore::LocalizedPacketListDo<Acore::WorldWorldTextBuilder> wt_do(wt_builder);
2619 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2620 {
2621 if (!itr->second || !itr->second->GetPlayer() || !itr->second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld())
2622 continue;
2623
2624 wt_do(itr->second->GetPlayer());
2625 }
2626
2627 va_end(ap);
2628}
2629
2630void World::SendWorldTextOptional(uint32 string_id, uint32 flag, ...)
2631{
2632 va_list ap;
2633 va_start(ap, flag);
2634
2635 Acore::WorldWorldTextBuilder wt_builder(string_id, &ap);
2636 Acore::LocalizedPacketListDo<Acore::WorldWorldTextBuilder> wt_do(wt_builder);
2637 for (auto const& itr : m_sessions)
2638 {
2639 if (!itr.second || !itr.second->GetPlayer() || !itr.second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld())
2640 {
2641 continue;
2642 }
2643
2644 if (sWorld->getBoolConfig(CONFIG_PLAYER_SETTINGS_ENABLED))
2645 {
2646 if (itr.second->GetPlayer()->GetPlayerSetting(AzerothcorePSSource, SETTING_ANNOUNCER_FLAGS).HasFlag(flag))
2647 {
2648 continue;
2649 }
2650 }
2651
2652 wt_do(itr.second->GetPlayer());
2653 }
2654
2655 va_end(ap);
2656}
2657
2659void World::SendGMText(uint32 string_id, ...)
2660{
2661 va_list ap;
2662 va_start(ap, string_id);
2663
2664 Acore::WorldWorldTextBuilder wt_builder(string_id, &ap);
2665 Acore::LocalizedPacketListDo<Acore::WorldWorldTextBuilder> wt_do(wt_builder);
2666 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2667 {
2668 // Session should have permissions to receive global gm messages
2669 WorldSession* session = itr->second;
2670 if (!session || AccountMgr::IsPlayerAccount(session->GetSecurity()))
2671 continue;
2672
2673 // Player should be in world
2674 Player* player = session->GetPlayer();
2675 if (!player || !player->IsInWorld())
2676 continue;
2677
2678 wt_do(session->GetPlayer());
2679 }
2680
2681 va_end(ap);
2682}

2685void World::SendGlobalText(const char* text, WorldSession* self)
2686{
2687 WorldPacket data;
2688
2689 // need copy to prevent corruption by strtok call in LineFromMessage original string
2690 char* buf = strdup(text);
2691 char* pos = buf;
2692
2693 while (char* line = ChatHandler::LineFromMessage(pos))
2694 {
2695 ChatHandler::BuildChatPacket(data, CHAT_MSG_SYSTEM, LANG_UNIVERSAL, nullptr, nullptr, line);
2696 SendGlobalMessage(&data, self);
2697 }
2698
2699 free(buf);
2700}

2703bool World::SendZoneMessage(uint32 zone, WorldPacket const* packet, WorldSession* self, TeamId teamId)
2704{

2706 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
2707
2708 for (itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2709 {
2710 if (itr->second &&
2711 itr->second->GetPlayer() &&
2712 itr->second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld() &&
2713 itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetZoneId() == zone &&
2714 itr->second != self &&
2715 (teamId == TEAM_NEUTRAL || itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetTeamId() == teamId))
2716 {
2717 itr->second->SendPacket(packet);
2718 foundPlayerToSend = true;
2719 }
2720 }
2721
2722 return foundPlayerToSend;
2723}

2734void World::KickAll()
2735{
2736 m_QueuedPlayer.clear(); // prevent send queue update packet and login queued sessions
2737
2738 // session not removed at kick and will removed in next update tick
2739 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2740 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAll sessions");
2741
2742 // pussywizard: kick offline sessions
2743 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_offlineSessions.begin(); itr != m_offlineSessions.end(); ++itr)
2744 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAll offline sessions");
2745}
2746
2748void World::KickAllLess(AccountTypes sec)
2749{
2750 // session not removed at kick and will removed in next update tick
2751 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
2752 if (itr->second->GetSecurity() < sec)
2753 itr->second->KickPlayer("KickAllLess");
2754}
2755
2757void World::_UpdateGameTime()
2758{
2760 Seconds lastGameTime = GameTime::GetGameTime();
2761 GameTime::UpdateGameTimers();
2762
2763 Seconds elapsed = GameTime::GetGameTime() - lastGameTime;
2764
2766 if (!IsStopped() && m_ShutdownTimer > 0 && elapsed > 0s)
2767 {
2769 if (m_ShutdownTimer <= elapsed.count())
2770 {
2771 if (!(m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2772 m_stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2773 else
2774 m_ShutdownTimer = 1; // minimum timer value to wait idle state
2775 }
2777 else
2778 {
2779 m_ShutdownTimer -= elapsed.count();
2780
2781 ShutdownMsg();
2782 }
2783 }
2784}
2785
2787void World::ShutdownServ(uint32 time, uint32 options, uint8 exitcode, const std::string& reason)
2788{
2789 // ignore if server shutdown at next tick
2790 if (IsStopped())
2791 return;
2792
2793 m_ShutdownMask = options;
2794 m_ExitCode = exitcode;
2795
2796 auto const& playersOnline = GetActiveSessionCount();
2797
2798 if (time < 5 && playersOnline)
2799 {
2800 // Set time to 5s for save all players
2801 time = 5;
2802 }
2803
2804 playersSaveScheduler.CancelAll();
2805
2806 if (time >= 5)
2807 {
2808 playersSaveScheduler.Schedule(Seconds(time - 5), [this](TaskContext /*context*/)
2809 {
2810 if (!GetActiveSessionCount())
2811 {
2812 LOG_INFO("server", "> No players online. Skip save before shutdown");
2813 return;
2814 }
2815
2816 LOG_INFO("server", "> Save players before shutdown server");
2817 ObjectAccessor::SaveAllPlayers();
2818 });
2819 }
2820
2821 LOG_WARN("server", "Time left until shutdown/restart: {}", time);
2822
2824 if (time == 0)
2825 {
2826 if (!(options & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE) || GetActiveAndQueuedSessionCount() == 0)
2827 m_stopEvent = true; // exist code already set
2828 else
2829 m_ShutdownTimer = 1; //So that the session count is re-evaluated at next world tick
2830 }
2832 else
2833 {
2834 m_ShutdownTimer = time;
2835 ShutdownMsg(true, nullptr, reason);
2836 }
2837
2838 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownInitiate(ShutdownExitCode(exitcode), ShutdownMask(options));
2839}
2840
2842void World::ShutdownMsg(bool show, Player* player, const std::string& reason)
2843{
2844 // not show messages for idle shutdown mode
2845 if (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_IDLE)
2846 return;
2847
2849 if (show ||
2850 (m_ShutdownTimer < 5 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % 15) == 0) || // < 5 min; every 15 sec
2851 (m_ShutdownTimer < 15 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % MINUTE) == 0) || // < 15 min ; every 1 min
2852 (m_ShutdownTimer < 30 * MINUTE && (m_ShutdownTimer % (5 * MINUTE)) == 0) || // < 30 min ; every 5 min
2853 (m_ShutdownTimer < 12 * HOUR && (m_ShutdownTimer % HOUR) == 0) || // < 12 h ; every 1 h
2854 (m_ShutdownTimer > 12 * HOUR && (m_ShutdownTimer % (12 * HOUR)) == 0)) // > 12 h ; every 12 h
2855 {
2856 std::string str = secsToTimeString(m_ShutdownTimer).append(".");
2857
2858 if (!reason.empty())
2859 {
2860 str += " - " + reason;
2861 }
2862
2863 ServerMessageType msgid = (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_TIME : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_TIME;
2864
2865 SendServerMessage(msgid, str, player);
2866 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "Server is {} in {}", (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"), str);
2867 }
2868}
2869
2871void World::ShutdownCancel()
2872{
2873 // nothing cancel or too later
2874 if (!m_ShutdownTimer || m_stopEvent)
2875 return;
2876
2877 ServerMessageType msgid = (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART) ? SERVER_MSG_RESTART_CANCELLED : SERVER_MSG_SHUTDOWN_CANCELLED;
2878
2879 m_ShutdownMask = 0;
2880 m_ShutdownTimer = 0;
2881 m_ExitCode = SHUTDOWN_EXIT_CODE; // to default value
2882 SendServerMessage(msgid);
2883
2884 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "Server {} cancelled.", (m_ShutdownMask & SHUTDOWN_MASK_RESTART ? "restart" : "shuttingdown"));
2885
2886 sScriptMgr->OnShutdownCancel();
2887}
2888
2890void World::SendServerMessage(ServerMessageType messageID, std::string stringParam /*= ""*/, Player* player /*= nullptr*/)
2891{
2892 WorldPackets::Chat::ChatServerMessage chatServerMessage;
2893 chatServerMessage.MessageID = int32(messageID);
2894 if (messageID <= SERVER_MSG_STRING)
2895 chatServerMessage.StringParam = stringParam;
2896
2897 if (player)
2898 player->SendDirectMessage(chatServerMessage.Write());
2899 else
2900 SendGlobalMessage(chatServerMessage.Write());
2901}
2902
2903void World::UpdateSessions(uint32 diff)
2904{
2905 {
2906 METRIC_DETAILED_NO_THRESHOLD_TIMER("world_update_time",
2907 METRIC_TAG("type", "Add sessions"),
2908 METRIC_TAG("parent_type", "Update sessions"));
2909
2911 WorldSession* sess = nullptr;
2912 while (addSessQueue.next(sess))
2913 {
2914 AddSession_(sess);
2915 }
2916 }
2917
2919 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(), next; itr != m_sessions.end(); itr = next)
2920 {
2921 next = itr;
2922 ++next;
2923
2925 WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2926 WorldSessionFilter updater(pSession);
2927
2928 // pussywizard:
2929 if (pSession->HandleSocketClosed())
2930 {
2931 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2932 m_disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2933 m_sessions.erase(itr);
2934 // there should be no offline session if current one is logged onto a character
2935 SessionMap::iterator iter;
2936 if ((iter = m_offlineSessions.find(pSession->GetAccountId())) != m_offlineSessions.end())
2937 {
2938 WorldSession* tmp = iter->second;
2939 m_offlineSessions.erase(iter);
2940 tmp->SetShouldSetOfflineInDB(false);
2941 delete tmp;
2942 }
2943 pSession->SetOfflineTime(GameTime::GetGameTime().count());
2944 m_offlineSessions[pSession->GetAccountId()] = pSession;
2945 continue;
2946 }
2947
2948 [[maybe_unused]] uint32 currentSessionId = itr->first;
2949 METRIC_DETAILED_TIMER("world_update_sessions_time", METRIC_TAG("account_id", std::to_string(currentSessionId)));
2950
2951 if (!pSession->Update(diff, updater))
2952 {
2953 if (!RemoveQueuedPlayer(pSession) && getIntConfig(CONFIG_INTERVAL_DISCONNECT_TOLERANCE))
2954 m_disconnects[pSession->GetAccountId()] = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2955 m_sessions.erase(itr);
2956 if (m_offlineSessions.find(pSession->GetAccountId()) != m_offlineSessions.end()) // pussywizard: don't set offline in db because offline session for that acc is present (character is in world)
2957 pSession->SetShouldSetOfflineInDB(false);
2958 delete pSession;
2959 }
2960 }
2961
2962 // pussywizard:
2963 if (m_offlineSessions.empty())
2964 return;
2965 uint32 currTime = GameTime::GetGameTime().count();
2966 for (SessionMap::iterator itr = m_offlineSessions.begin(), next; itr != m_offlineSessions.end(); itr = next)
2967 {
2968 next = itr;
2969 ++next;
2970 WorldSession* pSession = itr->second;
2971 if (!pSession->GetPlayer() || pSession->GetOfflineTime() + 60 < currTime || pSession->IsKicked())
2972 {
2973 m_offlineSessions.erase(itr);
2974 if (m_sessions.find(pSession->GetAccountId()) != m_sessions.end())
2975 pSession->SetShouldSetOfflineInDB(false); // pussywizard: don't set offline in db because new session for that acc is already created
2976 delete pSession;
2977 }
2978 }
2979}
2980
2981// This handles the issued and queued CLI commands
2982void World::ProcessCliCommands()
2983{
2984 CliCommandHolder::Print zprint = nullptr;
2985 void* callbackArg = nullptr;
2986 CliCommandHolder* command = nullptr;
2987 while (cliCmdQueue.next(command))
2988 {
2989 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "CLI command under processing...");
2990 zprint = command->m_print;
2991 callbackArg = command->m_callbackArg;
2992 CliHandler handler(callbackArg, zprint);
2993 handler.ParseCommands(command->m_command);
2994 if (command->m_commandFinished)
2995 command->m_commandFinished(callbackArg, !handler.HasSentErrorMessage());
2996 delete command;
2997 }
2998}
2999
3000void World::SendAutoBroadcast()
3001{
3002 if (m_Autobroadcasts.empty())
3003 return;
3004
3005 uint32 weight = 0;
3006 AutobroadcastsWeightMap selectionWeights;
3007
3008 std::string msg;
3009
3010 for (AutobroadcastsWeightMap::const_iterator it = m_AutobroadcastsWeights.begin(); it != m_AutobroadcastsWeights.end(); ++it)
3011 {
3012 if (it->second)
3013 {
3014 weight += it->second;
3015 selectionWeights[it->first] = it->second;
3016 }
3017 }
3018
3019 if (weight)
3020 {
3021 uint32 selectedWeight = urand(0, weight - 1);
3022 weight = 0;
3023 for (AutobroadcastsWeightMap::const_iterator it = selectionWeights.begin(); it != selectionWeights.end(); ++it)
3024 {
3025 weight += it->second;
3026 if (selectedWeight < weight)
3027 {
3028 msg = m_Autobroadcasts[it->first];
3029 break;
3030 }
3031 }
3032 }
3033 else
3034 msg = m_Autobroadcasts[urand(0, m_Autobroadcasts.size())];
3035
3036 uint32 abcenter = sWorld->getIntConfig(CONFIG_AUTOBROADCAST_CENTER);
3037
3038 if (abcenter == 0)
3039 {
3040 sWorld->SendWorldTextOptional(LANG_AUTO_BROADCAST, ANNOUNCER_FLAG_DISABLE_AUTOBROADCAST, msg.c_str());
3041 }
3042
3043 else if (abcenter == 1)
3044 {
3045 WorldPacket data(SMSG_NOTIFICATION, (msg.size() + 1));
3046 data << msg;
3047 sWorld->SendGlobalMessage(&data);
3048 }
3049
3050 else if (abcenter == 2)
3051 {
3052 sWorld->SendWorldTextOptional(LANG_AUTO_BROADCAST, ANNOUNCER_FLAG_DISABLE_AUTOBROADCAST, msg.c_str());
3053
3054 WorldPacket data(SMSG_NOTIFICATION, (msg.size() + 1));
3055 data << msg;
3056 sWorld->SendGlobalMessage(&data);
3057 }
3058
3059 LOG_DEBUG("server.worldserver", "AutoBroadcast: '{}'", msg);
3060}

3069void World::_UpdateRealmCharCount(PreparedQueryResult resultCharCount)
3070{
3071 if (resultCharCount)
3072 {

3074 uint32 accountId = fields[0].Get<uint32>();
3075 uint8 charCount = uint8(fields[1].Get<uint64>());
3076
3077 LoginDatabaseTransaction trans = LoginDatabase.BeginTransaction();
3078
3079 LoginDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = LoginDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(LOGIN_REP_REALM_CHARACTERS);
3080 stmt->SetData(0, charCount);
3081 stmt->SetData(1, accountId);
3082 stmt->SetData(2, realm.Id.Realm);
3083 trans->Append(stmt);
3084

3133void World::InitCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime()
3134{
3135 Seconds currentDeletionTime = Seconds(getWorldState(WS_DAILY_CALENDAR_DELETION_OLD_EVENTS_TIME));
3136 Seconds nextDeletionTime = currentDeletionTime > 0s ? currentDeletionTime : Seconds(Acore::Time::GetNextTimeWithDayAndHour(-1, getIntConfig(CONFIG_CALENDAR_DELETE_OLD_EVENTS_HOUR)));
3137
3138 // If the reset time saved in the worldstate is before now it means the server was offline when the reset was supposed to occur.
3139 // In this case we set the reset time in the past and next world update will do the reset and schedule next one in the future.
3140 if (currentDeletionTime < GameTime::GetGameTime())
3141 {
3142 m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime = nextDeletionTime - 1_days;
3143 }
3144 else
3145 {
3146 m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime = nextDeletionTime;
3147 }
3148
3149 if (currentDeletionTime == 0s)
3150 {
3151 sWorld->setWorldState(WS_DAILY_CALENDAR_DELETION_OLD_EVENTS_TIME, m_NextCalendarOldEventsDeletionTime.count());
3152 }

3191
3192void World::SetPlayerSecurityLimit(AccountTypes _sec)
3193{
3194 AccountTypes sec = _sec < SEC_CONSOLE ? _sec : SEC_PLAYER;
3195 bool update = sec > m_allowedSecurityLevel;
3196 m_allowedSecurityLevel = sec;
3197 if (update)

3201void World::ResetWeeklyQuests()
3202{
3203 CharacterDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_DEL_QUEST_STATUS_WEEKLY);
3204 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
3205
3206 for (SessionMap::const_iterator itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
3207 if (itr->second->GetPlayer())
3208 itr->second->GetPlayer()->ResetWeeklyQuestStatus();
3209
3210 m_NextWeeklyQuestReset = Seconds(Acore::Time::GetNextTimeWithDayAndHour(4, 6));
3211 sWorld->setWorldState(WS_WEEKLY_QUEST_RESET_TIME, m_NextWeeklyQuestReset.count());
3212
3213 // change available weeklies
3214 sPoolMgr->ChangeWeeklyQuests();
3215}

3282
3283void World::LoadDBVersion()
3284{
3285 QueryResult result = WorldDatabase.Query("SELECT db_version, cache_id FROM version LIMIT 1");
3286 if (result)
3287 {
3288 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3289
3290 m_DBVersion = fields[0].Get<std::string>();
3291
3292 // will be overwrite by config values if different and non-0
3293 m_int_configs[CONFIG_CLIENTCACHE_VERSION] = fields[1].Get<uint32>();
3294 }
3295
3296 if (m_DBVersion.empty())
3297 m_DBVersion = "Unknown world database.";
3298}

3300void World::UpdateAreaDependentAuras()
3301{
3302 SessionMap::const_iterator itr;
3303 for (itr = m_sessions.begin(); itr != m_sessions.end(); ++itr)
3304 if (itr->second && itr->second->GetPlayer() && itr->second->GetPlayer()->IsInWorld())
3305 {
3306 itr->second->GetPlayer()->UpdateAreaDependentAuras(itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetAreaId());
3307 itr->second->GetPlayer()->UpdateZoneDependentAuras(itr->second->GetPlayer()->GetZoneId());
3308 }
3309}
3310
3311void World::LoadWorldStates()
3312{
3313 uint32 oldMSTime = getMSTime();
3314
3315 QueryResult result = CharacterDatabase.Query("SELECT entry, value FROM worldstates");
3316
3317 if (!result)
3318 {
3319 LOG_WARN("server.loading", ">> Loaded 0 world states. DB table `worldstates` is empty!");
3320 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3321 return;
3322 }
3323
3324 do
3325 {
3326 Field* fields = result->Fetch();
3327 m_worldstates[fields[0].Get<uint32>()] = fields[1].Get<uint32>();
3328 } while (result->NextRow());
3329
3330 LOG_INFO("server.loading", ">> Loaded {} World States in {} ms", m_worldstates.size(), GetMSTimeDiffToNow(oldMSTime));
3331 LOG_INFO("server.loading", " ");
3332}
3333
3334// Setting a worldstate will save it to DB
3335void World::setWorldState(uint32 index, uint64 timeValue)
3336{
3337 auto const& it = m_worldstates.find(index);
3338 if (it != m_worldstates.end())
3339 {
3340 CharacterDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_UPD_WORLDSTATE);
3341 stmt->SetData(0, uint32(timeValue));
3342 stmt->SetData(1, index);
3343 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
3344 }
3345 else
3346 {
3347 CharacterDatabasePreparedStatement* stmt = CharacterDatabase.GetPreparedStatement(CHAR_INS_WORLDSTATE);
3348 stmt->SetData(0, index);
3349 stmt->SetData(1, uint32(timeValue));
3350 CharacterDatabase.Execute(stmt);
3351 }
3352
3353 m_worldstates[index] = timeValue;
3354}
3355
3356uint64 World::getWorldState(uint32 index) const
3357{
3358 auto const& itr = m_worldstates.find(index);
3359 return itr != m_worldstates.end() ? itr->second : 0;
3360}

3381
3382uint32 World::GetNextWhoListUpdateDelaySecs()
3383{
3384 if (m_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].Passed())
3385 return 1;
3386
3387 uint32 t = m_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].GetInterval() - m_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].GetCurrent();
3388 t = std::min(t, (uint32)m_timers[WUPDATE_5_SECS].GetInterval());
3389
3390 return uint32(std::ceil(t / 1000.0f));
3391}
